name: Door To Door (itch)
description:
Door To Door
A game made in 7 days for the Spooktober Game Jam.

Welcome to Door to Door, a speedrunning game about getting as much candy as fast as you can. Chain together your jumps to gain incredible speed. Gather lost souls to sacrifice to the Soul Mistress for one time use run modifiers to help boost your income! Sacrifice your hard earned candy to the Costume Demigod to swap out your current costume for an entirely new one with new buffs and uses!
